description: Adds an environment member to an Cloud9 development environment.

parameters.name: environmentId
parameters.description: The ID of the environment that contains the environment member you want to add.

parameters.name: userArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the environment member you want to add.

parameters.name: permissions
parameters.description: The type of environment member permissions you want to associate with this environment member. Available values include: read-only: Has read-only access to the environment. read-write: Has read-write access to the environment.

nested_items.name: membership
nested_items.description: Information about the environment member that was added.

nested_items.name: permissions
nested_items.description: The type of environment member permissions associated with this environment member. Available values include:
read-only: Has read-only access to the environment.
read-write: Has read-write access to the environment.

nested_items.name: userId
nested_items.description: The user ID in Identity and Access Management (IAM) of the environment member.

nested_items.name: userArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the environment member.

nested_items.name: environmentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the environment for the environment member.

nested_items.name: lastAccess
nested_items.description: The time, expressed in epoch time format, when the environment member last opened the environment.
